prompts.title: Cinematic Cyberpunk City
prompts.content: A futuristic cyberpunk city street at night, [Color] neon lights reflecting on wet pavement, towering skyscrapers with holographic advertisements, dense fog, cinematic lighting, photorealistic, 8k resolution.

prompts.title: 30-Day Fat Loss Plan
prompts.content: Create a 30-day workout plan focused on fat loss for a beginner. Include 3 days of strength training and 2 days of cardio per week. Provide a sample meal plan for one day with a caloric deficit.
prompts.description: Get a structured fat loss routine.

prompts.title: Hyper-Realistic Portrait Photography
prompts.content: Close-up portrait of an elderly fisherman, weathered face, deep wrinkles, intense eyes, natural lighting, shot on 85mm lens, f/1.8, bokeh background, ultra-detailed skin texture.

prompts.title: Explain Quantum Physics to a 5-Year-Old
prompts.content: Explain the basic concepts of quantum physics (superposition and entanglement) using simple analogies suitable for a 5-year-old child. Keep it fun and engaging.

prompts.title: Resume Bullet Points
prompts.content: Generate 5 high-impact resume bullet points for a [Job Role]. Focus on metrics like performance improvement, app store ratings, and delivery speed. Use action verbs.

prompts.title: Viral Instagram Reel Hook
prompts.content: Write 5 catchy hooks for an Instagram Reel about '[Topic]'. The hooks should stop the scroll and create curiosity.

prompts.title: Surreal Floating Island
prompts.content: A surreal floating island with waterfalls cascading into the void, ancient ruins, bioluminescent flora, dreamlike atmosphere, pastel colors, digital art style.

prompts.title: 20-Minute HIIT Cardio
prompts.content: Design a 20-minute High-Intensity Interval Training (HIIT) workout for home use. No equipment needed. distinct intervals of work and rest.

prompts.title: Blockchain for Beginners
prompts.content: Explain the concept of Blockchain technology using the analogy of a public digital ledger. Cover decentralization and security blocks.

prompts.title: Cover Letter Structure
prompts.content: Provide a template for a modern cover letter. Include sections for a hooked opening, relevant experience highlight, company alignment, and call to action.

prompts.title: LinkedIn AI Thought Leadership
prompts.content: Draft a LinkedIn post discussing the impact of AI on creative jobs. Keep the tone professional yet optimistic. Include 3 relevant hashtags.
